content: CP 680 Couplers Modular, versatile accessories to adapt CP 680 firestop cast-in devices for use in virtually any slab ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection ### FEATURES:Features Simple to install For use with sleeve extensions on concrete over 8 thick Water-resistant coupler available for applications where a stand-off extension is required Applications For use with CP 680 P/M Extending sleeve extensions on concrete above 8 thick Water resistant version for use with the stand-off extension ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2088736 - CP 680-P/M 2 COUPLER - Package Size 10 pc - 2173396 - Coupling CP 680-P/M 2 CPL - Package Size 10 pc - 2088732 - Water Tight Coupler CP 680 P/M 2 - Package Size 10 pc - 2173398 - Coupling CP 680-P/M 2 CPL WT - Package Size 10 pc - 2088737 - CP 680-P/M 3 COUPLER - Package Size 10 pc - 2213684 - Coupling CP 680-P/M 3 CPL - Package Size 10 pc - 2088733 - Water Tight Coupler CP 680 P/M 3 - Package Size 10 pc - 2213686 - Coupling CP 680-P/M 3 CPL WT - Package Size 10 pc - 2088734 - Water Tight Coupler CP 680 P/M 4 - Package Size 6 pc - 2173399 - Coupling CP 680-P/M 4 CPL WT - Package Size 6 pc - 2124423 - Coupling CP 680-P/M 4 CPL - Package Size 10 pc - 2173397 - Coupling CP 680-P/M 4 CPL - Package Size 10 pc - 2088739 - CP 680-P/M 6 COUPLER - Package Size 1 pc - 2213685 - Coupling CP 680-P/M 6 CPL - Package Size 1 pc - 2088735 - Water Tight Coupler CP 680 P/M 6 - Package Size 1 pc - 2213355 - Coupling CP 680-P/M 6 CPL WT - Package Size 1 pc
